title: Facing Issues With Firefox
content: I've been using Firefox as my primary web browser, but I've been experiencing frequent crashes, notifications, and slow performance issues. I've updated the browser and disabled some extensions like the downloaders and calculators, but the issues persist. Has anyone else encountered similar problems with Firefox, and what steps or troubleshooting techniques did you use to address these crashes and speed issues?
creator: afrasiabsajid9

title: Disabling GPU makes FF faster (on my machine)
content:
Hello there,

It's more an observation than a question.

FF was slow when several pages with video feeds were opened. Looking at the about:processes, I saw that the GPU usage was high. Disabling hardware acceleration solved this problem.

This occurred on a Dell XPS-15-9520, Win11, i5-12500H, 64GB RAM, Iris Xe. I don't have this problem on Linux machines.

May I suggest to benchmark and monitor hardware acceleration so that both CPU and GPU are used in case of heavy workload?

Many thanks,

Olivier. (very long time, happy, FF user ... )
creator: romarin12

title: Random cookies are being stored in firefox
content: I have strict tracking protection turned and and i have a rule set for both https and http for bing, yahoo, and some other sites, and no matter how many times i delete their cookies from the settings menu they keep coming back and i have no idea why. I dont see a logical reasons why my extensions would be doing that
creator: NastyFlytrap

title: click and drag scrolling is always extremely slow
content:
When I highlight text and move my cursor down to the bottom edge of the screen to scroll, it is super slow when going down. However if I do the same and scroll upwards by moving my mouse cursor to the top edge to scroll, it scrolls at a reasonable fast rate. The issue does not fix when I start in safe mode, or in private windows. The issue is exclusive to highlighting text and holding down to scroll. My scroll speed by clicking the scroll bar is normal, and so is using two fingers on my laptop (Asus Zenbook 14) to scroll down.

I don't encounter slow click and drag scrolling on google chrome.
creator: reyhan.quayum

title: mail folders
content: Hi. Thanks for your help. I like to save some emails in a detailed and extended folder list. Whenever I create a folder list to file emails I don't want to delete, it eventually disapears. How can I stop this happening?
creator: 4qzkztd57t

title: reinstaqlled firefox and my wife's google account is  in my browser
content: Firefox browser disappeared from my pc. I downloaded the revised version, but the new browser has my wife's google information in my browser page
creator: normbatcheler

title: Firefox brower keeps spinning - same url works fine in chrome & edge
content:
Whether I'm on a search page and click a link or type in the url, when I'm in Firefox (my preferred browser), it just spins and rarely reaches the site most of the time. If I'm in yahoo mail it often says "can't connect to internet". 

If I type the same url or click on a searched link in chrome or edge it works fine.  I don't get the "can't connect to internet" notice on the other two.  What is going on?
creator: joyousdirections

title: YouTube no longer always to play video resolution above 360p in FireFox anymore.
content: Why does FireFox not allow me to play videos in Youtube above the resolution 360p. Since now FireFox won't allow me to play YouTube videos from 720p or 1080p anymore. While other browser's allow me to play above 360p up to 4K resolution. What is going on with FireFox this never happen before until the upgrade of FireFox in Manajaro ARM.
creator: ltheocha
